event.title: “RMLL/LSM” in Montpellier, France
event.body: FSFE Fellows will run a booth at the RMLL/LSM event in Montpellier. Information, merchandise, and a friendly chat will be available. The event will take place at "Esplanade Charles de Gaulle", July 5 and 6th , and at "University of Montpellier II", from July 7th till 11th.
